articles.description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway built a record cash pile, reduced its Apple and Bank of America stakes, and halted stock buybacks last quarter.

articles.title: Remember those Starliner astronauts still in space? Don’t worry, they can vote. - USA TODAY
articles.description: Ahead of the Nov. 5 election, four Americans are in space who may want to vote. Fortunately for them, NASA has long had a plan to make it possible.
articles.content:
• Astronauts have voted in U.S. elections since 1997 when the Texas Legislature passed a bill that allowed NASA astronauts to cast ballots from orbit.
